metadata.value:
The Company

Hitachi Vantara combines technology, intellectual property, and industry knowledge to deliver data-managing solutions that help enterprises improve their customersâ€™ experiences, develop new revenue streams, and lower the costs of business. Hitachi Vantara elevates your innovation advantage by combining IT, operational technology (OT) and domain expertise.Â  Join our team and our employee-focused culture and help drive our customersâ€™ data to meaningful customer outcomes.

The Role

We are seeking a Solutions Engineer to join a fast-paced, highly collaborative engineering team. In this role, you will become an expert in and contribute to complex software solutions that include the combination of Hitachi offerings and strategic partner offerings.  The Engineering team embraces a highly collaborative development model that requires deep development and test involvement from start to finish for each project. 

Responsibilities

- Become a technical SME (subject matter expert) for complex software solutions that include Hitachi object storage offerings and strategic partner offerings
- Design & develop validation plans for these complex software solutions
- Contribute to hands on engineering tasks and projects to deliver solution reference architecture & best practices whitepapers
- Engage & collaborate with cross-functional Hitachi corporate teams, other Hitachi engineering teams, and strategic partner teams to bring joint solutions to market
- Assist with integrations, technology research, and reference solution design
- Contribute to automation code/test suites to identify potential regression in the solutions when Hitachi and/or partners release new software versions
- Triage automation test suites results
- Contribute to the design, development, deployment, management, monitor, and support of the online offering for all partners to self-certify their applications with Hitachi's object storage offering


Education & Experience Requirements
 
- 2-4+ years of hands-on contribution in software engineering or related field
- Understanding of engineering processes (including Agile methodologies)
- Advanced problem-solving skills
- Ability to convey complex technical information in a clear and concise manner
- Tech savvy, detail oriented, and highly driven
- Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills
- Passion for delivering results and a positive attitude for success
- Ability to handle and appropriately prioritize multiple projects and tasks
- Relevant formal education, including BSCS or MSCS

The following experience would be a plus:
 
- hands on development experience
- ability to ramp up on new technologies quickly
- experience with ambiguous projects

We are an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.inriniinii

demographic_questions.description:
At Hitachi Vantara, we value the diversity of our workforce and strive to foster an inclusive environment in which talent from all backgrounds can thrive, bringing their unique contributions to our culture and success. We are an equal opportunity employer and seek to strengthen our hiring practices by identifying and mitigating the potential for bias in our assessment and selection processes.

Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions that, if you choose to complete, will provide aggregated data to inform our hiring strategy and help us uphold our commitment to inclusive hiring.  Your responses, or choice to not respond, will in no way be linked to your specific application and will not be used to inform the hiring decision.

Our company does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or veteran status. In order to track the effectiveness of our recruiting efforts and ensure we consider the needs of all our employees, please consider the following optional questions.
